name: AvoidTheVoid: TurboPiggy Adventure
description:
Turbo decided to seek revenge for what Evident did to his best friend. In order to find Evident, Turbo must travel on an adventure that involves scaling a building and engaging in parkour.

Turbo meets his friends PotatoPie25, DannyIsDahBomb, and SuperGamerDX. They all three agree to assist Turbopiggy in getting to the obvious.

  • Feel free to watch the Devlog Video on my Youtube Channel NotEvoDev. Video is going to be uploaded soon.
